author: Special Correspondent
text:
Southern Railway will operate a special superfast train from Chennai Central to Howrah on Saturday to clear the extra rush of passengers.

An official release said the train (no. 06209) will leave at 5.10 p.m. on Saturday and will reach Howrah at 6.30 p.m. on Sunday. Advance reservation for the train has begun, the release added.
title: Special train to Howrah
